Midbrain of WHS11.EditorialNote: The cerebral aqueduct is currently segmented as part of the fourth ventricle.  This needs to be fixed.  The mammillary body is classified in the current MBAT version as part of the midbrain.  This needs to be fixed.  Note that the periaqueductal gray extends into what would typically be considered the medulla.
Midbrain of WHS11.Definition: Superparcellation of Waxholm mouse brain atlas, comprising the superior colliculus, inferior colliculus, substantia nigra, fasciculus retroflexus, interpeduncular nucleus, periaqueductal gray and a large unsegmented region (midbrain unsegmented).
